sections.heading: Act; applicability.Except as provided in section 86-124, the Telephone Consumer Slamming Prevention Act shall apply to all telecommunications companies providing basic local exchange service, intra-LATA interexchange service, inter-LATA interexchange service, and any other telecommunications service
sections.text: Act; applicability.Except as provided in section 86-124, the Telephone Consumer Slamming Prevention Act shall apply to all telecommunications companies providing basic local exchange service, intra-LATA interexchange service, inter-LATA interexchange service, and any other telecommunications service to subscribers in this state.SourceLaws 1999, LB 150, ยง 4;R.S.1943, (1999), ยง 86-1904;Laws 2002, LB 1105, ยง 66.
